title: Mrs. and Mr. Kohli
overview: Changing the norms of love, romance and marriage in today's world, the latest romantic Punjabi show Mr and Mrs Kohli, an MX Exclusive and Mirchi Play Original, brings about a change in the set gender roles in a marriage. Directed by Dheeraj Padiyar, the star cast of the latest Punjabi web series includes Sara Gurpal and Sahil Vedoliya in the roles of Sara & Sapan. The married couple lives a normal life like anybody else, one person earns for the family and the other runs the household, but the gender roles have been reversed. Sara - Mrs Kohli goes to work while Sapan - Mr Kohli is the house maker, who remains at home and performs the household chores. Exploring the new ways of love and breaking the gender norms, this show will open new horizons for a modern way of living.
